feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Asset Inventory
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Asset Inventory

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Service Management API + `servicemanagement.googleapis.com/Service`
entry.summary: The Service Management API resource type is now available through Cloud Asset Inventory APIs, including ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, Feed, and Search.
entry.title: Feature: New resource type available in Cloud Asset Inventory API

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), and [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds) APIs.
* Parameter Manager + `parametermanager.googleapis.com/Parameter` + `parametermanager.googleapis.com/ParameterVersion`
entry.summary: We are happy to announce that Parameter Manager resources are now publicly available through the Asset Inventory APIs, including ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, and Feed.
entry.title: Feature: Parameter Manager resources now publicly available

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Cloud Spanner + `spanner.googleapis.com/InstancePartition`
entry.summary: The Cloud Asset Inventory API now supports Cloud Spanner instance data, including instance partitions. This feature allows you to search and export Cloud Spanner resources through the Asset Inventory API.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud Spanner support in Cloud Asset Inventory API

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Security Command Center + `websecurityscanner.googleapis.com/ScanConfig`
entry.summary: The Asset Inventory API now supports exporting and querying Security Command Center ScanConfig resources, in addition to the previously supported resource types.
entry.title: Feature: Asset Inventory API adds Security Command Center resources

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), and [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds) APIs.
* Firebase Data Connect + `firebasedataconnect.googleapis.com/Connector` + `firebasedataconnect.googleapis.com/Schema` + `firebasedataconnect.googleapis.com/Service` * Integration Connectors + `connectors.googleapis.com/RegionalSetting` + `connectors.googleapis.com/Setting` * Network Connectivity + `networkconnectivity.googleapis.com/Group`
entry.summary: The Asset Inventory API now supports Firebase Data Connect, Integration Connectors, and Network Connectivity resources, enabling broader asset management capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: New Asset Inventory API Support

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Dataplex Universal Catalog + `dataplex.googleapis.com/Glossary`
entry.summary: The Dataplex Universal Catalog's Glossary resource is now available via the Asset Inventory API, including support for ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, Feed, and Search.
entry.title: Feature: Dataplex Universal Catalog Glossary Now Available

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Backup and DR Service + `backupdr.googleapis.com/Backup` + `backupdr.googleapis.com/BackupVault` + `backupdr.googleapis.com/DataSource` * Discovery Engine + `discoveryengine.googleapis.com/Notebook` * Migrate to Virtual Machines + `vmmigration.googleapis.com/ImageImport`
entry.summary: Backup and DR Service, Discovery Engine, and Migrate to Virtual Machines resource types are now available through the Asset Inventory API, including support for Backup, BackupVault, DataSource, Notebook, and ImageImport.
entry.title: Feature: New resource types available in Asset Inventory API

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Cloud Deploy + `clouddeploy.googleapis.com/Automation` + `clouddeploy.googleapis.com/AutomationRun` + `clouddeploy.googleapis.com/CustomTargetType` + `clouddeploy.googleapis.com/DeployPolicy` + `clouddeploy.googleapis.com/JobRun` * Dataproc Metastore + `metastore.googleapis.com/Federation`
entry.summary: Asset types for Cloud Deploy and Dataproc Metastore, including Automation, AutomationRun, CustomTargetType, DeployPolicy, JobRun, and Federation, are now available through various Asset Inventory APIs like ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, Feed, and Search.
entry.title: Feature: New Asset Types Available

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the [ExportAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/exportAssets), [ListAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/listing-assets), [BatchGetAssetsHistory](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/batchGetAssetsHistory), [QueryAssets](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/queryAssets), [Feed](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/feeds), and Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Cloud DNS + `dns.googleapis.com/ResourceRecordSet` + `dns.googleapis.com/ResponsePolicy` + `dns.googleapis.com/ResponsePolicyRule`
entry.summary: The Cloud DNS API now supports the following resource types: ResourceRecordSet, ResponsePolicy, and ResponsePolicyRule. These can be accessed via ExportAssets, ListAssets, BatchGetAssetsHistory, QueryAssets, Feed, and Search APIs.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud DNS API now supports new resource types

entry.content:
The following resource types are now publicly available through the Search ([SearchAllResources](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllResources), [SearchAllIamPolicies](https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/reference/rest/v1/TopLevel/searchAllIamPolicies)) APIs.
* Eventarc + `eventarc.googleapis.com/Enrollment` + `eventarc.googleapis.com/GoogleApiSource` + `eventarc.googleapis.com/MessageBus` + `eventarc.googleapis.com/Pipeline`
entry.summary: The Search API now supports Eventarc resources, including Enrollment, GoogleApiSource, MessageBus, and Pipeline.
entry.title: Feature: Search API now supports Eventarc
